title: Alpha Client
body: So I just got accepted into alpha(thanks riot!:3) but whenever I load it up the client doesn't fit onto my screen ;-; And whenever I click on the right side where the log in place is it just disappears. Plz halp... I would send a screenshot but I don't know how to srry

replies.body: use ctrl+ + or ctrl + - it works
how do you send a screen shot?

Can you clarify if you're meaning that the Alpha Client is not resizable? Also, can you clarify where you're clicking on the Alpha client when it disappears? Send me [a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) so I have a bit more context.
